data.title: Famous People Born in 1953
data.meta_description: Celebrate the birthdays of 789 famous people, historical figures and celebrities born in 1953 like Benazir Bhutto, Xi Jinping and George Brett.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 789

Alpha Blondy [Seydou Koné], Ivorian reggae singer-songwriter ("Jerusalem"; "Journalistes en danger"), born in Dimbokro, N'Zi Region, Ivory Coast

Jan 1 Gary Johnson, American businessman, politician and Libertarian Party nominee for President in 2016, born in Minot, North Dakota

Angelo Parisi, French judoka (Olympic gold heavyweight 1980), born in Arpino, Italy

Jan 3 Peter Taylor, English soccer winger (4 caps; Crystal Palace, Tottenham Hotspur) and manager (Leicester City, Hull, Crystal Palace), born in Rochford, England

Norberto Alonso, Argentine soccer midfielder (19 caps; River Plate), born in Vicente López, Argentina
